stimulusHtml: Find the average acceleration of train A over the interval 2 ≤ t ≤ 8.

features.html: Train A runs back and forth on an east-west section of railroad track. Train A's velocity, measured in meters per minute, is given by a differentiable function vA(t) , where time t is measured in minutes. Selected values for vA(t) are given in the table above.
